ComicInfo.Title: The Insurgents Ball
ComicInfo.Summary: The Insurgents Ball: Luxura arrives at a party in the 1920s to discover a vampire orgy of sex and blood drinking. Vampire Maximilian takes Luxura to his personal chambers for some romance, when suddenly the party in interrupted by three members of the Red Militia who are killing everyone. Maximilian pleads his case, but Luxura beheads him and sets fire to the building while making her escape.
